评论详情: At the time of my purchase (and looking at it now) the title of this item says “hoodie”, so between that and the hood in the model pics I thought there was a hood attached/tucked in at the collar. There’s not.  Love the material, good fit, but not what I thought I was getting based on the title and model photos.

Very thick material, hard to put on and take off but looks very nice. It tore under the arm but I have since sewn and mended it. I recommend reinforcing under the arms inside the seam with a little super glue.
You see a lot of people warning about the underarm area ripping a lot but not the case for me. This turned heads for sure, I love the design and the material is high quality water resistant too.
Very good quality it just smells like a mf .. plastic smell imma have to hang it up in a separate closet or something. It’s nice but that fresh paint plastic smell is intense.
The smell has permeated everything in my room... good quality, though!
I didn’t expect it to be this premium but I’m happy

评论概述: Good quality durable yet light weight
评论详情: I'm 6'1 240 so the second pic is to show the length. be careful if you're a large guy because the range of motion in the under arm can cause tension that could tear a seem. I wear it when I ride and love the fact that the back has enough room to cover my backpack (superdry)

Dont get me wrong. This product looks cool and could be functional but its not.  Why buy a product that rips a little tiny bit every time you try and put it on?  Ps. I am almost the exact same dimension as the they used.

评论概述: The concept is neat, but the heavyweight is not for me.
评论详情: I'm a 5'2 female and about 140 lbs. Take this review with a grain of salt, this might be a lot better on someone with a bigger figure...  I only ordered the heavy weight because the lighter weights were not in stock, and I really liked the concept of these jackets. The heavy weight is basically a weighted raincoat, and even with as a nice outfit it looks rather silly because of its material and size. Not to mention, when I put my arms out in front of me, the jacket puffs out by a lot and makes me look more silly. Don't get this unless lighter weights are in stock, or if you don't want your friends to ask if you're about to go into airsoft warfare.
Sehr wertiges dickes gummiartiges Material, hält regen zuverlässig ab... Riecht leider etwas streng.

Fabric of the Universe Techwear - crop jacket. A+ for quality and construction. The material is waterproof and not weak/thin. Inside seams are properly tapered and not exposed. Fit is a bit wide, but that is for aesthetics to create a thin silhouette of your torso in contrast to your top.  Negative 1 star because this garment isn't functional. It looks like an athletic top, but if you were to actually use it for anything active it would probably rip just due to how it is designed (mainly for looks).
It's amazing. I love it and is exactly as shown. Such quality 😁
Nice texture, nice size, nice design, everything about it seems great. Super cool. Absolutely love it <33

I was a bit skeptical before purchasing this but to my surprise ! It actually looks insane ! The quality is amazing ! I wish it hugged my body better doe ... but none the less ! It actually is very cool and looks futuristic ! I put on an arm sleeve to complete the look .
